text: Dunbar is an unincorporated community in Butler County, Kentucky, United States. The community is located on Kentucky Route 70 southwest of Morgantown. Dunbar has a post office with ZIP code 42219. The post office was established on April 19, 1898. Its name is a blend of those of two local families: the Dunns and the Barrows. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Butler County, Kentucky Category:Unincorporated communities in Kentucky
title: Dunbar, Kentucky
